  • Implement and enforce best practices around infrastructure hardening, authentication, and access control‚Äîincluding maintaining certificate authority presence across machines.

  • Stay ahead of the curve on security threats and emerging tools, keeping LiveKit‚Äôs infrastructure resilient and hardened.

About You

  • You are an engineer. One that builds and breaks systems, in equal measure.

  • You‚Äôve previously owned or led security engineering at an infrastructure-heavy company.

  • You‚Äôre fluent in Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud-native tooling.

  • You can audit a system and tell what‚Äôs wrong‚Äînot just on the surface, but under the hood.
